title: Art and Architecture in Italy, 1250 to 1400 (Art Ebook).pdf
description:
Art and Architecture in Italy, 1250 to 1400
Penguin Books | 1966 | ISBN: N/A | English | 680 pages | PDF | 76.1 MB

The fourteenth century in Italian art is a very rich one, not only in painting and sculpture but also in architecture, and Professor White's book is the first to give the art and the architecture equal weight. The story which unfolds itself from generation to generation - the story of the Gothic style in Italy and the prehistory of the Renaissance -is told brilliantly: all the facts are related, the history of style is traced, but also the works of art are described with insight and as objects valuable for their own sakes, and not simply as data for fitting into schemes and theories
